Body:
assert not repo.is_dirty()
file = Path('test')
file.touch()
assert repo.is_dirty(untracked=True)
assert not repo.is_dirty()
repo.commit('test')
assert not repo.is_dirty(untracked=True)
assert not repo.is_dirty()
file.write_text('moo')
assert repo.is_dirty(untracked=True)
assert repo.is_dirty()
repo.stage_all()
assert repo.is_dirty(untracked=True)
assert repo.is_dirty()
